main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing a large white glowing object in the sky on December 4, 1966, in Johnson City, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object was described as half-moon shaped and approximately the size of a school bus., The sighting lasted only about 20 seconds., Witnesses observed the object moving rapidly and disappearing suddenly., Another witness described a bright light resembling a basketball that hovered over a house for a few minutes., The similar sightings happened on separate occasions, suggesting a pattern of unusual activity.
sighted object: large white glowing object shaped like a half-moon
witness description: Peggy and her friend Alma observed the object together.
